localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Mibo is videochat made for informal meetings, remote drinks, social mixers, networking events, or just hanging out with your team. In Mibo, you decide what conversations to join and where to hang out. Mibo feels like being together. Just like real life.
blogPost.body: Mibo is videochat made for informal meetings, remote drinks, social mixers, networking events, or just hanging out with your team. In Mibo, you decide what conversations to join and where to hang out. Mibo feels like being together. Just like real life.
blogPost.title: Mibo - Videoconferencing that feels like real life
blogPost.author: Taco Ekkel

localize.description: Mibo是为非正式会议、远程酒会、社交聚会、网络活动或只是与你的团队一起闲逛而设计的视频聊天软件。在Mibo中，您可以决定加入什么对话和在哪里闲逛。Mibo感觉就像在一起。就像现实生活一样。
localize.tagline: 宛如真实生活的视频会议

localize.description: Mibo是爲非正式會議、遠程酒會、社交聚會、網絡活動或只是與你的團隊一起閒逛而設計的視頻聊天軟件。在Mibo中，您可以決定加入什麼對話和在哪裏閒逛。Mibo感覺就像在一起。就像現實生活一樣。
localize.tagline: 宛如真實生活的視頻會議

previous.excerpt: Yogile is a sleek photo management app that lets you store an unlimited number of photos without worrying about running out of storage on your phone or computer.
previous.title: Yogile - Photo storage simplified

localize.description: Yogile是一款时尚的照片管理应用，它可以让你存储无限数量的照片，而不用担心手机或电脑的存储空间不够用。
Yogile是一款時尚的照片管理應用，它可以讓你存儲無限數量的照片，而不用擔心手機或電腦的存儲空間不夠用。

next.excerpt: A Searchable Airtable database with over 200+ Curated Resources to include templates, essays, articles, and frameworks to help aspiring PM's and Startups Learn Product Management.
next.title: Docdrop - Database of 200+ product management learning resources

localize.description: 一个可搜索的Airtable数据库，拥有超过200个精选资源，包括模板、论文、文章和框架，以帮助有抱负的PM和初创公司学习产品管理。
一個可搜索的Airtable數據庫，擁有超過200個精選資源，包括模板、論文、文章和框架，以幫助有抱負的PM和初創公司學習產品管理。
